titles: A true & exact history of the island of Barbados illustrated with a mapp of the island, as also the principall trees and plants there, set forth in their due proportions and shapes, drawne out by their severall and respective scales : together with the ingenio that makes the sugar, with the plots of the severall houses, roomes, and other places that are used in the whole processe of sugar-making ... / by Richard Ligon, Gent.
author: Ligon, Richard.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Imperfect: frontispiece, plans, and maps lacking in filmed copy. Page 84, plans, and maps photographed and inserted at end.
